draft_response.suggested_subject: Re: Q4 Budget Review - Approval Needed by Friday
draft_response.draft_body:
Hi Jane,

Thank you for sending over the updated Q4 budget proposal for the Website Redesign project.

I've received the Budget_Proposal_Q4.xlsx attachment and will review the revised allocations today. I appreciate you highlighting the key changes:
- 15% development budget increase for new features
- $20K reallocation from marketing to infrastructure  
- $10K contingency fund addition

I'll provide my approval by end of day Thursday (Nov 14) to ensure you have time to prepare for the Monday board submission.

Regarding the December launch timeline - [YOUR_INPUT_NEEDED: Confirm if still on track or provide updated timeline]. I'll make sure this is reflected accurately in my budget approval.

If I have any questions about the numbers while reviewing, I'll reach out promptly.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
